Uses of Interface
tp.pr5.instructions.Instruction

  • Packages that use Instruction 
    Package Description
    tp.pr5  
    tp.pr5.instructions  

    • Uses of Instruction in tp.pr5

      Methods in tp.pr5 that return Instruction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Instruction Interpreter.generateInstruction(java.lang.String line)
      Generates a new instruction according to the user input
      Methods in tp.pr5 with parameters of type Instruction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RobotEngine.communicateRobot(Instruction c)
      It executes an instruction.

    • Uses of Instruction in tp.pr5.instructions

      Classes in tp.pr5.instructions that implement Instruction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DropInstruction
      This instruction drops an Item from the current place and puts it the robot inventory.
      class  HelpInstruction
      Shows the game help with all the instructions that the robot can execute.
      class  MoveInstruction
      Its execution moves the robot from one place to the next one in the current direction.
      class  OperateInstruction
      The Instruction for using an item.
      class  PickInstruction
      This instruction tries to pick an Item from the current place and puts it the robot inventory.
      class  QuitInstruction
      Its execution request the robot to finish the simulation This Instruction works if the user writes QUIT or SALIR
      class  RadarInstruction
      This Instruction shows the description of the current place and the items in it.
      class  ScanInstruction
      The execution of this instruction shows the information of the inventory of the robot or the complete description about the item with identifier id contained in the inventory This Instruction works if the player writes SCAN or ESCANEAR (id is not mandatory)
      class  TurnInstruction
      Its execution rotates the robot This Instruction works if the robot writes TURN LEFT or RIGHT or GIRAR LEFT or RIGHT
      Methods in tp.pr5.instructions that return Instruction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Instruction ScanInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning a ScanInstruction instance or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction OperateInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning an instance of OperateInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction RadarInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning an instance of RadarInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction TurnInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning a TurnInstruction instance or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction HelpInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning a HelpInstruction instance or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction PickInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning an instance of PickInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction MoveInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning a MoveInstruction instance or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction DropInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning an instance of DropInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction QuitInstruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parsers the String returning an instance of QuitInstruction or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
      Instruction Instruction.parse(java.lang.String cad)
      Parses the String returning an instance its corresponding subclass if the string fits the instruction's syntax.
